name: Salmon Piccata
author: CHEDDAR97005
summary: Delicious lemony salmon piccata! Serve topped with additional capers and lemon slices.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed
¼ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper and dredge in flour
Cook until browned, quickly flipping the salmon halfway through, about 5 minutes total
Remove from the skillet for a moment
Add lemon juice to the skillet and scrape the bottom with a wooden spoon
Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork and sauce is reduced by half, 6 to 8 minutes more
Serve with sauce drizzled on top
